rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with traditional Kerala-style elements, featuring stone thresholds and wooden panels. It follows Vastu principles by ensuring clear alignment with the main door.

A spacious living room that serves as a communal space, merging into an open-plan kitchen area for a seamless flow. Large windows provide natural light and maintain Vastu orientation with south-facing openings.

The open-plan kitchen is integrated with the living area, designed with modern amenities while retaining Kerala traditional motifs. Natural ventilation is ensured through east or north openings following Vastu principles.
A dedicated dining space that connects to the kitchen and living area, enhancing the open-plan feel while respecting traditional Kerala aesthetics. Windows are strategically placed for optimal light.
The master bedroom designed with Kerala-style wooden detailing and natural light from windows oriented to avoid negative Vastu flows.
A secondary bedroom designed with traditional elements, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu norms with proper directional openings.
An additional bedroom for guests or personal use, incorporating Kerala-style design with focus on positive energy alignment through window placements.
A two-car garage area integrated into the ground floor, designed with easy access and robust construction following local norms and Vastu principles. It includes a covered pathway for vehicles.

openings.description: Main door is placed in the north as per Vastu recommendations, providing secure entry and aligning with traditional Kerala aesthetics.
Windows are strategically placed to maximize natural light and ventilation while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Additional openings on the west side ensure proper air circulation throughout the ground floor, in line with sustainable design practices.

rooms.description: An additional bedroom designed on the upper floor, ensuring privacy and enhanced comfort with traditional Kerala style elements.
A dedicated study or home office space that offers a quiet environment for work. Windows are oriented to provide optimal natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
A balcony area providing outdoor access and fresh air, designed with traditional Kerala aesthetics and following Vastu recommendations for open spaces.

openings.description: Windows in the upper floor are placed to maximize natural light and maintain a harmonious energy flow, conforming to Vastu norms.
Balcony door with south facing orientation enhances the connectivity between indoor and outdoor spaces.
